description: Main entry point and root widget of a Flutter application for Menu Image Generator. It sets up environment loading, theme configuration, application routes, and a global banner warning if the OpenAI API key is missing.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: StatelessWidget that builds the MaterialApp with custom theme and route configuration.

classes.name: _RootWithBanner
classes.description: StatelessWidget that wraps a child widget and displays a global warning banner if the OPENAI_API_KEY is missing.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, and runs the app.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a custom dark theme for the application using Material 3 design.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method in MyApp that returns a MaterialApp widget with specified theme, routes, and initial route.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method in _RootWithBanner that displays a warning banner if the API key is missing.
